DevOps_Comments.File Description: Extracted the 'Peek View' full raw .json code prior to initiation of Test #4, detailing the additional lines of code and dynamic content added to rebuild the missing sections that previously existed during the last successful run of the flow
DevOps_Comments.File Purpose: To help with debugging flow issues by providing a snapshot of the raw Power Automate 'Compose' action's 'Peek Code' view that is used to compile the final .html document that will be created when Test #1 is initiated

inputs:
Department of Veterans Affairs

Hines VA Medical Center

Home Based Primary Care (HBPC) Discharge Form

HBPC_Discharge_@{coalesce(if(empty(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']), 'Hines', if(contains(string(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']), 'Value'), split(split(string(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']), '"Value":"')[1], '"')[0], string(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']))), 'Hines')}_@{coalesce(triggerOutputs()?['body/PatientFullName'], 'Unknown Patient')}
@{coalesce(if(empty(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']), 'HINES TEAM', if(contains(string(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']), 'Value'), concat(split(split(string(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']), '"Value":"')[1], '"')[0], ' TEAM'), concat(string(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']), ' TEAM'))), 'HINES TEAM')}

ðŸ“‹ Official HBPC Discharge Document

This document contains the complete discharge form data for the termination of Home Based Primary Care services.

ðŸ“‹ Discharge Summary

Patient Name @{coalesce(triggerOutputs()?['body/PatientFullName'], 'Not provided')}
PACT Team @{coalesce(if(empty(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']), 'Hines', if(contains(string(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']), 'Value'), split(split(string(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']), '"Value":"')[1], '"')[0], string(triggerOutputs()?['body/HBPCPACTTeam']))), 'Hines')}
Record ID #@{triggerOutputs()?['body/ID']}
Discharge Date @{if(and(not(empty(triggerOutputs()?['body/DateEvaluated'])), not(equals(triggerOutputs()?['body/DateEvaluated'], null))), formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(triggerOutputs()?['body/DateEvaluated'], 'UTC', 'Central Standard Time'), 'MM/dd/yyyy'), 'Not provided')}
Marital Status @{if(empty(triggerOutputs()?['body/MaritalStatus']), 'Not specified', if(contains(string(triggerOutputs()?['body/MaritalStatus']), 'Value'), split(split(string(triggerOutputs()?['body/MaritalStatus']), '"Value":"')[1], '"')[0], string(triggerOutputs()?['body/MaritalStatus'])))}
Usual Living Arrangements @{if(empty(triggerOutputs()?['body/UsualLivingArrangements']), 'Not specified', if(contains(string(triggerOutputs()?['body/UsualLivingArrangements']), 'Value'), split(split(string(triggerOutputs()?['body/UsualLivingArrangements']), '"Value":"')[1], '"')[0], string(triggerOutputs()?['body/UsualLivingArrangements'])))}
Form Submitted @{if(empty(outputs('Get_item')?['body/Created']), 'Not available', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(outputs('Get_item')?['body/Created'], 'UTC', 'Central Standard Time'), 'MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm tt'))} CST
Submitted By @{coalesce(outputs('Get_item')?['body/Author/DisplayName'], 'Unknown')}
Discharge Status @{if(empty(triggerOutputs()?['body/DischargeStatus']), 'Not specified', if(contains(string(triggerOutputs()?['body/DischargeStatus']), 'Value'), split(split(string(triggerOutputs()?['body/DischargeStatus']), '"Value":"')[1], '"')[0], string(triggerOutputs()?['body/DischargeStatus'])))}
